content.text:
# Shitleshwar Mahadev Temple

The Shitleshwar Mahadev Temple is a Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in the town of Jhalawar, Rajasthan, India. This temple was built in 689 AD by Voppak during the reign of Durgagan.
Many idols and remains of temples of the ancient Chandrabhaga city are still found on the banks of the Chandrabhaga river.
